comments:
I'm using the M7 with CVS enabled. I change a file, save it. It is indicated as
"dirty" in the package explorer. Then I select "CVS", "Commit..." from the menu
bar and it says me "The selected resource do contain any changes." But when I
repeat with "Team", "Commit..." from the context menu it works.

When mapping any CVS command to hot keys it also does not work. 

The "Switch to Another Branch or Version" function throws an Ex. when invoking
it from menu bar. The context menu works fine too.
